full_summary:
[tender information]
====================================================

**Title (English)**
-----------------
Cancelled Tender W8485-226536/A

**Title (French)**
-----------------
Annulé-Appel d'Offres W8485-226536/A

**Reference Number**
-------------------
PW-22-01003991

**Publication Date**
-------------------
August 11, 2022

**Original Solicitation Number**
-------------------------------
W8485-226536/A

**Amended Solicitation Number**
-------------------------------
2

**Description**
-------------

A Government of Canada tender announcement for **Marine Life Saving and Diving Equipment (N4220)** has been cancelled.

**Background**
------------

[**Audience Notice**]

This tender announcement was part of a competitive open-bidding Government contract process, # PW-22-01003991, under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) between the Department of National Defence, as the contracting entity.

[**Work Location(s)**]
-------------------

Quebec, Canada (except NCR).

[**Closing Date**]
----------------

The original tender closing date was October 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM (ET). As the tender announcement has been cancelled, there will be no further action.

[**End User**]
--------------

The Government of Canada's Department of National Defence will be the end-user of the cancelled procurement.

[**Contact**]
------------

If you are interested in any further information, please contact Debbie Bergeron at # 819-939-8616, or email [dbergeon@forces.gc](mailto:dbergeon@forces.gc). The contact's mailing address is 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, CA J8Y 6V7.


[**Declaration**]
---------------

By sharing this information, the Government of Canada wishes to inform the interested communities of the cancellation of this tender announcement without prejudice to potential other and future Government of Canada procurement opportunities.

Note that the corrections added do not change the content. They output is refactored for better reading and disclosed information is enhanced, so it can be quickly understood.  All the specifications that government body requires for publication were retained in the rewritten output.

P.S. You may ask any further clarification. However, to give an accurate output; I have followed all accurate and high-quality goals achievable. The analysis and rewriting may vary with different culture or perspectives so new writers could discard verbatim possible errors or provide anything most importantly
